definition: to draw out/to pull out from in between/to remove part of the whole/(of certain plants) to sprout or bud/to whip or thrash
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: Their farm set up a pumping station this year.
sentences.chinese: 他們農場今年新修了一個抽水站。

sentences.english: It can also be used in pumping station and diversion works with long pipes.
sentences.chinese: 本裝置也可以應用於長輸水管道抽水站及引水工程。

sentences.english: Sunny Bay Salt Water Pumping Station under construction.
sentences.chinese: 興建中的欣澳鹹水抽水站。

sentences.english: There is running water only every other day because the pumping station requires electricity.
sentences.chinese: 因爲抽水站需要用電，自來水每隔一天才來。

sentences.english: Many pumping stations couldn't keep up with the heavy rainfall caused by typhoon Nari.
sentences.chinese: 抽水站無法及時應付納莉颱風所帶來的豪雨。

sentences.english: The pumping station roared into action.
sentences.chinese: 抽水站隆隆口向着開始工作了。

sentences.english: This pumping station is responsible for periodic checks of pumps in its administrative area.
sentences.chinese: 這個抽水站負責所轄範圍內揚水設施的定期檢查。

sentences.english: There is a pumping station beside the road.
They will build a pumping station nearby the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他們將要在橋附近造一個抽水站。

sentences.english: And four of its water-pumping stations still run on steam power.
sentences.chinese: 其中的四個抽水站依舊是依靠蒸汽運作。

definition: lit. village of three households/name of essay column in Beijing newspaper from 1961-1966, written by Deng Tuo 鄧拓|邓拓, Wu Han 吳晗|吴晗 and Liao Mosha 廖沫沙, criticized as anti-party during the Cultural Revolution
Zhongliao or Chungliao township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Neipu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Fuxing or Fuhsing township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
Kouhu township in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
